entries.description: Minimum SAM CLI version has been increased to 0.47.0
Support for CloudWatch Logs. View, filter, and stream log streams as well as quickly view logs from Lambda or ECS Containers.
Add support for creating and running Lambdas with dotnet core 3.1. Debug support will come in a future release
Add mechanism for users to submit feedback from within the toolkit
Support for the 2020.1 family of IDEs
Fix issue #1011, python test files will no longer be recognized as lambda handlers
Fix a situation where a valid SAM executable would not be recognized as valid
Fix several issues with updating the SAM cli while the IDE is open
Close the S3 bucket viewer when you delete the bucket
Correct the max file size that can be opened from the S3 browser to idea.max.content.load.filesize instead of a constant 5MB
Fix stack overflow when a profile has a `role_arn` but not a `source_profile`
Fix SpeedSearch not working in S3 Bucket viewer
Removed the ability to create a new SAM project for dotnet core 2.0 since it is a deprecated runtime
